tech_news.title: Apple Design Executive Alan Dye Poached by Meta in Major Coup - Bloomberg.com
tech_news.description: Meta Platforms Inc. has poached Apple Inc.’s most prominent design executive in a major coup that underscores a push by the social networking giant into AI-equipped consumer devices.

tech_news.title: Tencent's alleged Horizon rip-off is ironically back in the news as company agrees to halt promotion amid Sony lawsuit - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Tencent has agreed to halt all promotion and public testing of Light of Motiram, described as a "slavish clone" of Horizon, as it battles Sony in court.

tech_news.title: An unsettling indie game about horses keeps getting banned from stores - The Verge
tech_news.description: Horses, a horror indie game developed by Santa Ragione, has been banned from both Steam and Epic Games Store, with its creators saying they weren’t told why.
